db:abstract.db:para: Series type for creating a bar chart.

db:listitem.db:para: BarSeries, HorizontalBarSeries, HorizontalPercentBarSeries, HorizontalStackedBarSeries, PercentBarSeries, and StackedBarSeries

db:section.db:title: Detailed Description
db:section.db:para: The following QML shows how to create a simple bar chart:

db:section.db:title: axisX : AbstractAxis
db:section.db:para: The x axis used for the series. If you leave both axisX and axisXTop undefined, a BarCategoriesAxis is created for the series.

db:section.db:title: axisXTop : AbstractAxis
db:section.db:para: The x axis used for the series, drawn on top of the chart view. Note that you can only provide either axisX or axisXTop, but not both.

db:section.db:title: axisY : AbstractAxis
db:section.db:para: The y axis used for the series. If you leave both axisY and axisYRight undefined, a ValueAxis is created for the series.

db:section.db:title: axisYRight : AbstractAxis
db:section.db:para: The y axis used for the series, drawn to the right on the chart view. Note that you can only provide either axisY or axisYRight, but not both.

db:section.db:title: barWidth : real
db:section.db:para: The width of the bars of the series. The unit of width is the unit of x-axis. The minimum width for bars is zero and negative values are treated as zero. Setting the width to zero means that width of the bar on screen is one pixel no matter what the scale of x-axis is. Bars wider than zero are scaled with x-axis. Note that with QBarSeries this value means the width of one group of bars instead of just one bar.

db:section.db:title: count : int
db:section.db:para: Holds the number of sets in series.

db:section.db:title: labelsFormat : string
db:section.db:para: The format used for showing labels in series.

db:section.db:title: labelsPosition : string
db:section.db:para: Defines the position of value labels.

db:section.db:title: labelsVisible : bool
db:section.db:para: Defines the visibility of the labels in series

db:section.db:title: onBarsetsAdded(BarSet barset)
db:section.db:para: Emitted when barset has been added to the series.

db:section.db:title: onBarsetsRemoved(BarSet barset)
db:section.db:para: Emitted when barset has been removed from the series.

db:section.db:title: onClicked(int index, BarSet barset)
db:section.db:para: The signal is emitted if the user clicks with a mouse on top of BarSet. Clicked bar inside set is indexed by index

db:section.db:title: onCountChanged()
db:section.db:para: This signal is emitted when barset count has been changed, for example by append or remove.

db:section.db:title: onDoubleClicked(int index, BarSet barset)
db:section.db:para: The signal is emitted if the user doubleclicks with a mouse on top of BarSet. Doubleclicked bar inside set is indexed by index

db:section.db:title: onHovered(bool status, int index, BarSet barset)
db:section.db:para: The signal is emitted if mouse is hovered on top of series. Parameter barset is the pointer of barset, where hover happened. Parameter status is true, if mouse entered on top of series, false if mouse left from top of series. Hovered bar inside the set is indexed by index.

db:section.db:title: onLabelsAngleChanged(qreal angle)
db:section.db:para: Signal is emitted when the angle of the value labels is changed.

db:section.db:title: onLabelsPositionChanged(LabelsPosition position)
db:section.db:para: Signal is emitted when the position of value labels is changed.

db:section.db:title: onPressed(int index, BarSet barset)
db:section.db:para: The signal is emitted if the user presses with a mouse on top of BarSet. Pressed bar inside set is indexed by index

db:section.db:title: onReleased(int index, BarSet barset)
db:section.db:para: The signal is emitted if the user releases with a mouse on top of BarSet. Released bar inside set is indexed by index

db:section.db:title: BarSet append(string label, VariantList values)
db:section.db:para: Adds a new bar set with label and values to index. Values is a list of reals. For example:

db:section.db:title: BarSet at(int index)
db:section.db:para: Returns bar set at index. Returns null if the index is not valid.

db:section.db:title: clear()
db:section.db:para: Removes all barsets from the series.

db:section.db:title: BarSet insert(int index, string label, VariantList values)
db:section.db:para: Inserts a new bar set with label and values to index. Values can be a list of reals or a list of XYPoints. If index is zero or smaller, the new barset is prepended. If the index is count or bigger, the new barset is appended.

db:section.db:title: bool remove(BarSet barset)
db:section.db:para: Removes the barset from the series. Returns true if successful, false otherwise.
